issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
None of my apps are displaying analytics correctly.
One app (with about 150 analytic events) takes ~5 minutes to load then says it timed out and could not load
Another takes ~1 min and loads but displays 0 for every value even though there have been analytic events occuring

comments.body:
Hi,

Can you tell me whether do you use enterprise dashboard or community we console? 
If it is ok, would you please provider us some screen shots for your problem. 
Also the app key and guid of your app, (for security reason, you can email me those detail).

Regards,
Shuo
Email: sliang@appcelerator.com
